title: Putin defends 'noble' war amid allegations of rape, brutality and chemical weapons - Reuters
content:
1. Putin defends 'noble' war amid allegations of rape, brutality and chemical weapons  Reuters
  2. US and UK investigating reports of chemical weapons being used by Russia in Ukraine war - BBC News  BBC News
  3. Ukraine probes claim poisonous substance dropped in Mariupol  The Associated Press - en Espa√±ol
  4. Zelenskyy Addresses Possible Chemical Weapons Used In Mariupol  NBC News
  5. Ukraine War: US 'deeply concerned' at report of Mariupol chemical attack  BBC.com
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin on Tuesday defended the war in Ukraine as a "noble" mission that would achieve its goals as his troops massed for a new offensive amid allegations of rape, brutality against civilians and possible use of chemical weapons.
